comment.author: 31967799@N07
comment._content: Apparently, Sarah Anne Lawson (Anne spelled thus) was born in 1838, which would have made her either 7 or 8 years old at the time this picture was taken. She died in 1893, (aged 54 or 55), two years after the death of her husband Christopher Lethbridge. Such a shame that she did not live to a great age..... She married when she was (give or take a year) 47, already at an age that would have made her someone considered to be an "old maid" at that time, and she only had around six years of marriage before her husband died on January 13, 1891. He was 71 when he died. www.merchantnetworks.com.au/genealogy/web/lethbridge/pafg...
